public abstract class AbstractTextWidget
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
implements HasId, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHTML, HasResponsiveness, HasInlineStyle, com.google.gwt.editor.client.IsEditor<com.google.gwt.editor.client.LeafValueEditor<String>>, HasPull

Base class for Widget that just contains text.

Author:
Sven Jacobs, Joshua Godi
